price: ¿Acaso les parece esto una hechicería, o es que no ven?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
